name: Anti-Magic
effect:
:ongoing: Until the end of the Combat, the selected \* [unit](../units/index.md) cannot be targeted by spells:

:empower: 0 ➣ \*:bronze:
:empower: 2 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver:
:empower: 4 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver: or :golden:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: Units that are protected from spells via Anti-Magic are also immune to area effects of spells (e.g. [Fireball spell](../spells/fireball.md)).
